mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jianli_uuid_number as jianliUuidNumber ,a.jianli_name as jianliName ,a.jianli_xingming as jianliXingming ,a.jianli_sex_types as jianliSexTypes ,a.jianli_phone as jianliPhone ,a.jianli_photo as jianliPhoto ,a.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,a.jiaoyu_text as jiaoyuText ,a.shixi_text as shixiText ,a.geren_text as gerenText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM jianli a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.jianli_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jianli_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliName},'%')
and a.jianli_xingming like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliXingming},'%')
and a.jianli_sex_types = #{params.jianliSexTypes}
and a.jianli_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliPhone},'%')
and a.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and a.jiaoyu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoyuText},'%')
and a.shixi_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiText},'%')
and a.geren_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.gerenText},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
